name: Mission to Io
description:
>BOOTING

"MISSION TO IO"
 A LUDUM DARE 43 PROJECT BY 
 @ADAM_DBS
 THEME: Sacrifices must be made

A short text adventure set on a transport ship bound for Io. Things are afoot.

This game makes heavy use of sound, make sure it is enabled. And turn off the lights for max immersion.

Uses Ink for narrative programming.
